TEXT: A primordial shaman from the Foglands. NL Deceives and demolishes her foes with traps and elemental magic.

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~sister,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~

#g~CONSCIOUSNESS.~ NL NL You are awake again, to the dull sting and soothing incantations of your tribe's healers mending your wounds. NL You recall it now. Traps evaded, curses nullified; your #gcharge has defeated you, a fugitive on the lam. NL NL ...But where is she running to?
